title: Windows8系统万Minecraft出现以下情况，求解！！
author: 我叫柠檬
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Sorry :(

Time: 14-1-24 上午10:56
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:244)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:367)
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Stacktrace:
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)

        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:367)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.2
        Operating System: Windows 8 (x86) version 6.2
        Java Version: 1.7.0_11, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)

        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

求解

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content:
给你三个建议：
1、装回win7
2、升级配置
3、重装java

帮助到你了请给我最佳答案～

replies.author: 我叫柠檬
replies.txt_content:
我被盗号了 发表于 2014-1-24 14:33
给你三个建议：
1、装回win7
2、升级配置
最佳答案：还有别的方法吗？[diamond_gem]

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content: minecraft本来就没有准备去主动支持win8

replies.author: cailike
replies.txt_content:
给你三个建议
1:你的系统是32位的你就装32位java，64位的就装64位的java
2:换个启动器
3：装回win7（这是迫不得已）
